awards.text: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 11 nominations.

fullplot: A Polish-Jewish family arrives in the US at the beginning of the century and they and their children try to build themselves a better future in the promised land.
plot: A Polish-Jewish family comes to the USA at the beginning of the Twentieth Century. There, the family and their children try to make themselves a better future in the so-called promised land.
title: Avalon
